summary: This document is a personal character reference or description of the relationship between Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, portraying them as a long-term couple with shared interests and complementary personalities. It emphasizes their constant companionship, mutual respect, and Ghislaine's independent, intelligent, and adventurous nature.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as being in a long-term romantic partnership with Ghislaine Maxwell for 11 years, sharing many mutual interests including travel and art, and rarely being apart from her.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as Jeffrey Epstein's partner of 11 years, highly intelligent, multilingual, adventurous, independent, and having her own business pursuits. The author details her personality, interests, and her close, complementary relationship with Epstein.

connections.description: Described as being together as a couple for 11 years, rarely apart, sharing mutual interests, being best friends, and complementing each other well.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell are described as having been a romantic couple for 11 years at the time of the document's writing.
The document portrays them as inseparable, stating they are 'rarely apart' and the author 'almost always' sees them together.
Ghislaine Maxwell is characterized as highly intelligent, independent, strong-willed, multilingual, and adventurous with numerous personal interests and business pursuits.
The relationship is depicted as one of deep companionship and mutual admiration, with the author stating they 'compliment each other really well' and are 'the best of friends.'
The document serves as a personal character sketch, potentially intended to counter public perception, as it begins by stating their relationship is 'contrary to what many people think.'
